name: yellow_card
example: Maximilian MEYER (Germany) is booked by the referee. 或 BARKLEY (England) is yellow carded.
pattern: <人名>(<國家>)(犯規內容/ is yellow carded)

name: red_card
example: M. PEREIRA (Uruguay) is given his marching orders.

name: yellow_card_second
example: W. PALACIOS (Honduras) is booked for the second time and receives a red card!
pattern: <人名>(<國家>) is booked for the second time and receives a red card!

name: substitution_in_out
example: SERGIO OLIVEIRA (in) comes off the bench to replace CHICO RAMOS (out) (Portugal)
pattern: <上場球員> (in) comes off the bench to replace <下場球員> (out) (<國家>)

name: first_end
example: The referee brings the first half to an end.

name: penalty
example: SON Heungmin (Korea Republic) successfully converts the penalty! 或 (0 - 0) Morgan BRIAN (USA) successfully converts the penalty!
pattern: <比分><人名>(<國家>) successfully converts the penalty!

name: penalty_wrong
example: (0 - 0) Christen PRESS (USA) misses from the penalty spot! 或 (0 - 0) Alex MORGAN (USA) sees his penalty saved by the goalkeeper.
